snippet.title: Seasonspree trailer!
snippet.description:
Wishlist Seasonspree on Steam: https://bit.ly/SeasonspreeSteam

Seasonspree is a gentle time-nudging game about Sunny, an adorable little tanuki on a small planet filled with animal friends. In this world, the passing of each season is celebrated with a big party, and it's up to Sunny to help her friends prepare for that party.

Sunny can walk through time in both directions, make decisions that affect the future, then go back and change those decisions for better results and happier friends.

Look for Seasonspree later this year on PC and Nintendo Switch!

www.KitewingStudio.com/Seasonspree
